name: TonyKaravasilev/CryptoManana
description: CryptoManana is a cryptography framework for boosting your project's security.

suggest.ext-libsodium: PHP < 7.0.0: Cryptography library loaded as a PHP extensions.
suggest.ext-sodium: PHP >= 7.0.0: Cryptography library used by newest PHP core features.
suggest.ext-zend-opcache: Recommended for high speed execution and memory optimizations.
suggest.ext-apcu: Recommended for Composer autoloading optimization level 2/B and caching.
suggest.ext-mbstring: Use only for multi-byte string encodings support and implementations.
suggest.ext-event: Interface for the libevent library and a port to the PHP infrastructure.
suggest.ext-xdebug: Useful for Web/CLI debugging and profiling, plus needed for Code Coverage.
